note.p: Education: University College School, London; Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1874), MA (1878), DSc (1884)
Career: Assistant Master, Eton College; on scientific staff on Sir George Nares' (FRS 1875) arctic expedition; undertook scientific work for the Challenger expedition
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1892 vol 51 pp xxxvii-xxxviii signed by A M M
